text: Vladimír Zábrodský (7 March 1923 - 20 March 2020) was a Czechoslovak ice hockey player. He played centre. He was born in Prague, Czechoslovakia. He won a silver medal at the 1948 Winter Olympics and he was two-time world champion (1947, 1949). He was a member of the International Ice Hockey Federation Hall of Fame, added in 1997. He played in the Czechoslovak First Ice Hockey League for LTC Praha from 1940 to 1950, Spartak ČKD Sokolovo from 1950 to 1960, and Bohemians ČKD Praha from 1963 to 1965.
